SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Chain Lightning
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Circle of Death
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Disintegrate
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Eyebite
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Mass Suggestion
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Move Earth
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: Sunbeam
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-line.

SorcererLevel6Spells.Name: True Seeing
SorcererLevel6Spells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.
